casebody.data:
Leon BENOIT, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. DUBL-CUSHION EGG CARTON, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 200. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 23, 1939. Samuel W. Banning, of Chicago, 111. (Fred J. Bechert, of New York City, and Ephraim Banning, of Chicago, 111., of counsel), for appellant. Fritz Ziegler, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
